statements: UPDATE MarketData SET open_price = 100.50, close_price = 105.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-05';

UPDATE market_data SET closing_price = 200.45 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-15';

UPDATE investment_portfolio SET shares_owned = shares_owned + 100, investment_amount = investment_amount + 5000 WHERE portfolio_id = 101 AND stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE Market_Data SET close_price = 150.75, date = '2022-05-10' WHERE id = 1001;
